songs.title: Big Bertha
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
I'm the snake, yeah yeah
PyrexTurnMeUp
Hood baby
It’s crazy but it's true

[Chorus]
I'm at the tip top (Tip top)
Keep a big Glock (Big Glock)
Throw the round on it make a nigga pistol drop (It drop)
They lookin’ sad now 'cause I'm gettin' big guap (Say what)
Big Bertha gon' put 'em on the news (Big Bertha)
Big Bertha gon' shoot my shoots (Big Bertha)
Big Bertha gon' do what it do (Big Bertha)
Big Bertha gon’ get all the loot (Big Bertha)
Big Bertha gon’ find all the clues (Big Bertha)
Big Bertha gon' GPS you (Big Bertha)
That boy is overdue (Overdue)
I already warned you (I warned you)
Hood babies you know they shoot (Hood baby)
By Gotit, they make a move (Brr)

[Verse 1]
Hood baby gon’ keep that ratchet (Slimeball)
What nigga tryna catch this static (Slimeball)
They cannot cap this true (Slimeball)
They forever lackin' (Slimeball)
Put money in the mattress (Slimeball)
They put a snake in the casket (Slimeball)
This neckpiece matching (Slimeball)
Put a snake in the ashes (Brr)

[Chorus]
I'm at the tip top (Tip top)
Keep a big Glock (Big Glock)
Throw the round on it make a nigga pistol drop (It drop)
They lookin' sad now ’cause I'm gettin' big guap (Say what)
Big Bertha gon' put 'em on the news (Big Bertha)
Big Bertha gon' shoot my shoots (Big Bertha)
Big Bertha gon' do what it do (Big Bertha)
Big Bertha gon' get all the loot (Big Bertha)
Big Bertha gon' find all the clues (Big Bertha)
Big Bertha gon' GPS you (Big Bertha)
That boy is overdue (Overdue)
I already warned you (I warned you)
Hood babies you know they shoot (Hood baby)
By Gotit, they make a move (Brr)

[Verse 2]
I fished a up [?], you can't share
Windows tinted, slidin' through
Hotbox, we ridin' fools
See us made that, woo (It's crazy)
And we catch 'em down bad, that's just us (That's just us)
No cap

[Chorus]
I'm at the tip top (Tip top)
Keep a big Glock (Big Glock)
Throw the round on it make a nigga pistol drop (It drop)
They lookin' sad now 'cause I'm gettin' big guap (Say what)
Big Bertha gon' put 'em on the news (Big Bertha)
Big Bertha gon' shoot my shoots (Big Bertha)
Big Bertha gon' do what it do (Big Bertha)
Big Bertha gon' get all the loot (Big Bertha)
Big Bertha gon' find all the clues (Big Bertha)
Big Bertha gon' GPS you (Big Bertha)
That boy is overdue (Overdue)
I already warned you (I warned you)
Hood babies you know they shoot (Hood baby)
By Gotit, they make a move (Brr)
